General.Name: Shenzhen Water Planning & Design Institute Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Water Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd. offers technical services. The company provides survey and design, planning consultation, and project operation and management services for water construction projects. It also offers urban water resources supply, water security, water environment restoration, and other services. It provides survey services, including engineering inspection and measurement, hydrological surveying and mapping, water conservancy and water affairs survey, hydrogeological survey, geotechnical engineering survey, and other projects. The company also offers design services, such as engineering design of water conservancy projects, water diversion, irrigation and drainage, river regulation, urban flood control, soil and water conservation, hydrological facilities, etc., as well as municipal water supply and drainage, transmission and transformation electrical, architectural, and landscape architecture engineering design services; and generates hydropower. Shenzhen Water Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

2.Name: Mr. Zhan  Li
